welcome_message_body: Welcome to the charming city of Riano, Italy! Known for its picturesque landscapes, rich history, and delicious cuisine, we invite you to explore and fall in love with all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ciampino Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Ciampino Airport, primarily used for charter and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for budget airlines and charter flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A modern terminal used for international flights, including long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
